files.name: username
username
files.content:
<FormField
  control={form.control}
  name="username"
  render={({ field }) => (
    <FormItem>
      <FormLabel>Username</FormLabel>
      <FormControl>
        <Input
          placeholder="@johndoe"
          disabled={isPending}
          type="text"
          {...field}
        />
      </FormControl>
      <FormMessage />
    </FormItem>
  )}
/>
